hero.headline: YouTube Evergreen Content Strategy
hero.subheadline: Create once, earn views forever. Content that stands the test of time.

sections.content: Evergreen content generates views months and years after publishing. Unlike trending topics that spike and die, evergreen videos compound over time through search traffic. A library of evergreen content creates sustainable, predictable growth regardless of upload frequency.

faq.question: How much of my content should be evergreen?
faq.answer: Aim for 50-70% evergreen, 30-50% timely/trending. Evergreen builds foundation, trending captures moments. Balance based on your niche.

faq.question: How to make tutorials evergreen?
faq.answer: Focus on concepts over specific UI. When software changes, update video or description. Teach principles that don't change, show current implementation.

faq.question: Should I update old evergreen videos?
faq.answer: Yesâ€”annual review minimum. Update description, add cards to newer content, re-edit if significantly outdated. Don't let great content become inaccurate.

faq.question: Can gaming/entertainment be evergreen?
faq.answer: Harder but possible. Game guides for popular titles, genre overviews, skill tutorials. Avoid news/updates. Focus on timeless entertainment value.
